channel.title: Evija Rea on Latvian songs ABC notation
channel.description: Recent content in Evija Rea on Latvian songs ABC notation

item.title: Haven't met you yet (Harry's Song)
item.description: Hey I haven't met you yet Blank paper's laying on my desk Gonna think of perfect picture to draw for you Pen is shaking in my hand It's just scared to make a mistake You know, I'll draw who you are 'Cause you're perfect as you are anyway I know you're gonna stumble But I know you're gonna reach it, I know you're gonna rock our world I know you will be jumping But I know you will be landing And I know you're gonna rock our world You're another new note On the manuscript paper It's strong and it's visible as it hasn't dried yet Don't let it dry Don't let it fade Make steps out of clouds you're heart will make your song.
